title: Problem with me
body: Soo i have a pretty normal PC but it overheats for no reason and then i get the afk penalties i have one at the moment ill play it tomorrow but i mean its really unfair in my opinion its not that i want to leave the games my pc just dsnt love me and i get penalties even tho i get back as soon as i can so yh someone give me an advice or tell me smthg so i wouldnt get the panalties because its rlly annoying and i even stopper playing ranked games so i dont throw i only play normals and its sad for me because i want to be higher rank and atm i cant aford a new pc and the fixers say ahm ugh ur pc is perfect like wtf

replies.body:
If you're pc is overheating that's a sign that you may want to do some general PC troubleshooting. Overheating can happen for a variety of reasons, sometimes not being able to support the software being run, other times just because your fans aren't working properly. 

I'd strongly suggest troubleshooting that overheating before pushing your pc too much harder. If you need, reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some tips you can try.
